gold.user: User wants to retrieve a list of all signing keys associated with their Twilio account to manage them effectively.
gold.ideal: A successful response containing an array of signing keys with their details.

gold.user: User needs to fetch details of a specific signing key using its Sid to verify its properties.
gold.ideal: A successful response with the details of the specified signing key.

gold.user: User wants to update the properties of an existing signing key to enhance security or change its usage.
gold.ideal: A successful response confirming the signing key has been updated with the new properties.

gold.user: User intends to delete a signing key that is no longer needed to maintain account security.
gold.ideal: A successful response indicating that the signing key has been deleted.
